   sphinx-quickstart on Sun May 25 10:16:38 2025.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

ZLEL documentation
==================

This documentation belongs to the ZLEL project (Linear and Nonlinear Electrical Circuits),
developed as part of the course "Zirkuitu Linealak eta Ez-Linealak" at the University of the Basque Country (UPV/EHU).

It includes the complete source code documentation, simulation engine details, and guides to perform
DC, transient, and operating point analyses using the ZLEL Python-based simulator.

**Authors:**
- Eneko Aranburu (earanburu006@ikasle.ehu.eus)
- Alvaro Beltran (abeltrandenanc002@ikasle.ehu.eus)

See the `reStructuredText <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/index.html>`_
documentation for syntax help.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
